page.title: 14TRADE AND TRANSPORT
page.content: In the second World War there was much more industry in Otley. Many of the industries were in engineering. Quite a few of the engineering works made weapons or other items to help soldiers. Since the war, thefts have increased and a lot of surrounding countryside has gone. There did not used to be any factories along Pool Road. Otley Show used to be held where the rugby field on Pool Road now stands. The cattle for the market were brought into Otley by train instead of by lorries. Before the bus station was built the buses used to run from in front of the Conservative Club.Many of the new schools have been built since the Second World War.
